summary: All four requirements (REQ-11, REQ-12, REQ-13, REQ-14) have been implemented. The backend FoodItem type now includes an optional imageUrl field, the FoodCard component displays food photos with appropriate styling and fallback UI, the UploadRecipeForm includes an image URL input field, and the implementation references static assets from the public directory. However, the actual image files themselves are not present in the diff, and the seedRealData function populates all imageUrl fields with null instead of the required image paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Existing seedRealData function populates imageUrl for all food items with appropriate image paths following the pattern frontend/public/assets/generated/[food-name].png
missing_requirements.reason: The seedRealData function in backend/main.mo sets imageUrl to null for all seeded items (Churros, Mochi Ice Cream, Timbits, Pastel de Nata, Bubble Tea) instead of populating them with the appropriate image paths

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the generated food photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any image files being added to the frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory. Only 1 file was added (backend/migration.mo) and 6 were modified, but no image assets appear in the diff

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module for schema upgrade from OldFoodItem to NewFoodItem
hallucinated_features.reason: A migration.mo module was created to handle upgrading existing FoodItem records when adding the imageUrl field. This migration functionality was not requested in the BuildRequest
